title: Erika Tatiana Camacho
summary: Erika Tatiana Camacho is a Mexican-born American mathematical biologist and professor of applied mathematics at Arizona State University.[1][2] She is a 2014 Presidential Award for Excellence in Science, Mathematics, and Engineering Mentoring (PAESMEM) awardee.[3] She was taught and mentored in high school by Jaime Escalante, who was the subject of the movie Stand and Deliver.[4]
